title: Elizabeth Taylor’s Sapphire-and-Diamond Brooch Returning to Market
text:
Elizabeth Taylor's 37.29 carat sapphire and diamond brooch Courtesy of Sotheby's

Text size

Elizabeth Taylor ’s antique sapphire-and-diamond brooch, gifted to her by Richard Burton during their marriage, will be offered for sale at Sotheby’s Hong Kong in October, with an estimate of between HK$13.5 million and HK$18 million (US$1.7 million and $2.3 million).

The antique brooch was sold as part of the jewelry collection of the legendary actress at Christie’s in New York in December 2011. It realized US$1.3 million against a presale high estimate US$200,000.

Taylor had initially spotted the brooch on a magazine cover, and her then-husband Burton purchased it for her as a surprise. The two were married from 1964 to 1976.
description: The piece is expected to fetch up to HK$18 million at a Sotheby’s auction
